revision.comment: add missing final period (full stop) in 'From ...' line
revision.text: ==English== {{wikipedia}} ===Etymology=== Borrowed from {{bor|en|he|ייחוד}}. ===Noun=== {{en-noun|-}} # {{lb|en|Judaism}} The [[prohibition]] in [[Jewish]] [[religious]] [[law]] against [[seclusion]] in a private area of a [[man]] and a [[woman]] who are not [[married]] to each other, so as to prevent [[adultery]] or [[promiscuity]]. [[Category:English 2-syllable words]]
